creator: Zoundio AB
descriptionHtml:
The Gibson App - The only guitar app you need.

WATCH
Gibson's original TV series about guitars, music, and culture. Watch, learn, and get inspired.

LEARN
Follow a learning curriculum from the basics to advanced skills. You'll get step-by-step guidance, adding one finger and one skill at a time, so you always have the optimal conditions for your learning. Never too hard, and never too easy - just right for you. Learn at your own pace and track your progress. The interactive lessons turn each learning step into an immersive and motivating experience. It even listens to you play and gives you feedback in real-time.

You'll have a great time playing even if you're brand new at guitar. Each lesson has multiple genres, so choose the genre you like the most. All lessons are developed by expert teachers. All you need to get started is an acoustic or electric guitar and headphones. No cables are needed.

PLAY
Learn to play or jam to songs from some of the greatest guitarists in history, including Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Billie Eilish, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Foo Fighters, Thin Lizzy, and many more. Each song is adjusted to your skill level, so you always get the optimal challenge when learning the songs. And we’re always adding new songs.

TUNE
The built-in tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. If you’re a beginner, there’s a “how to tune” video that will guide you.
---------
SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
Amped offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$14.99 per month
$89.99 per year
These prices are for the US. Pricing in other countries may vary. For the yearly subscription, we offer a free trial. You can cancel anytime during the free trial and not be charged. The annual subscription will automatically start unless you cancel at least 24-hours before the end of your trial period. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of your free trial period will be lost when you purchase a subscription.

Privacy policy ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of use ampedguitar.com/terms.html

CONTACT AND SUPPORT
Let us know if you run into any trouble or if you have any feedback or questions. Check out our website or the FAQ in the app. You can also email your questions or feedback on app.support@gibson.com or join the community on:
facebook.com/gibson
instagram.com/gibsonguitar/
twitter.com/gibsonguitar
Enjoy, and good luck!

You'll have a great time playing even if you're brand new at guitar. Each lesson has multiple genres, so choose the genre you like the most. All lessons are developed by expert teachers. All you need to get started is an acoustic or electric guitar and headphones. No cables are needed.

PLAY
Learn to play or jam to songs from some of the greatest guitarists in history, including Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Billie Eilish, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Foo Fighters, Thin Lizzy, and many more. Each song is adjusted to your skill level, so you always get the optimal challenge when learning the songs. And we’re always adding new songs.

TUNE
The built-in tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. If you’re a beginner, there’s a “how to tune” video that will guide you.
---------
SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS
Amped offers two auto-renewing subscription options:
$14.99 per month
$89.99 per year
These prices are for the US. Pricing in other countries may vary. For the yearly subscription, we offer a free trial. You can cancel anytime during the free trial and not be charged. The annual subscription will automatically start unless you cancel at least 24-hours before the end of your trial period. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account.

You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of your free trial period will be lost when you purchase a subscription.

Privacy policy ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of use ampedguitar.com/terms.html

CONTACT AND SUPPORT
Let us know if you run into any trouble or if you have any feedback or questions. Check out our website or the FAQ in the app. You can also email your questions or feedback on app.support@gibson.com or join the community on:
facebook.com/gibson
instagram.com/gibsonguitar/
twitter.com/gibsonguitar
Enjoy, and good luck!

title: Gibson

creator: Zoundio AB
descriptionHtml:
The best way to learn guitar! Immersive & interactive guitar lessons with real-time feedback. Learn at your own pace with step-by-step guidance from some of the world’s best guitarists. 100% beginner friendly and loads of famous songs.
 The Gibson App includes every tool and lesson you need on your guitar learning journey. And it gives it to you in a fun and immersive way so you’ll always have a motivating learning experience.

IMMERSIVE AND MOTIVATING LEARNING The interactive lessons turn each learning step into an immersive and motivating experience. It listens to you play and gives you feedback in real-time. And you’ll learn without ever feeling like a beginner. You’ll get optimal learning conditions, never too hard, never too easy - just right for you.

FULL LEARNING CURRICULUM From beginner to pro. Follow a step-by-step learning saga developed by expert teachers. Learn at your own pace and track your progress. When ready, head for the famous songs where you can deep dive into each song and the skills needed to ace it.

STEP-BY-STEP GUIDANCE Learn skills and songs in bite-sized parts, and get step-by-step video guidance for each part before you play the interactive game play.

100s OF FAMOUS SONGS The song catalogue includes Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Lynyrd Skynyrd and many more. New songs are added regularly.

LEARN FROM SOME OF THE WORLD’S BEST GUITARISTS Step-by-step video guidance from world-class guitarists and teachers, combined with an interactive gameplay will keep your engagement and motivation on top!

GIBSON TV Watch Gibson's original TV series about guitars, music, and culture. Watch, learn, and get inspired.

TRAINING CALENDAR Try to play a little each day. Short regular sessions are better than one long session. Use the training calendar to set a structure and get gentle reminders.

TUNE The built-in tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. If you’re a beginner, there’s a “how to tune” video that will guide you.

METRONOME Nail the rhythm with this metronome that includes all the standard features. The Gibson App - The only guitar app you need.

---------

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS We offer two auto-renewing subscription options: $14.99 per month $89.99 per year These prices are for the US. Pricing in other countries may vary. For the yearly subscription, we offer a free trial. You can cancel anytime during the free trial and not be charged. The annual subscription will automatically start unless you cancel at least 24-hours before the end of your trial period. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account.  You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of your free trial period will be lost when you purchase a subscription.

CONTACT AND SUPPORT Run into trouble? Or have feedback, questions or suggestions? Contact us at app.support@gibson.com or check out the FAQ in the app.

Privacy policy ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html Terms of use ampedguitar.com/terms.html

Enjoy, and good luck!

/The Gibson App team

The best way to learn guitar! Immersive & interactive guitar lessons with real-time feedback. Learn at your own pace with step-by-step guidance from some of the world’s best guitarists. 100% beginner friendly and loads of famous songs.

 The Gibson App includes every tool and lesson you need on your guitar learning journey. And it gives it to you in a fun and immersive way so you’ll always have a motivating learning experience.

IMMERSIVE AND MOTIVATING LEARNING : The interactive lessons turn each learning step into an immersive and motivating experience. It listens to you play and gives you feedback in real-time. And you’ll learn without ever feeling like a beginner. You’ll get optimal learning conditions, never too hard, never too easy - just right for you.

FULL LEARNING CURRICULUM : From beginner to pro. Follow a step-by-step learning saga developed by expert teachers. Learn at your own pace and track your progress. Learn to read tabs and practice chords. When ready, head for the famous songs where you can deep dive into each song and the skills needed to ace it.

STEP-BY-STEP GUIDANCE:  Learn skills and songs in bite-sized parts, and get step-by-step video guidance for each part before you play the interactive game play.

100s OF FAMOUS SONGS:  The song catalogue includes Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Lynyrd Skynyrd and many more. Find your favourite band. New songs are added regularly.

LEARN FROM SOME OF THE WORLD’S BEST GUITARISTS:  Step-by-step video guidance from world-class guitarists and teachers, combined with an interactive gameplay will keep your engagement and motivation on top!

GIBSON TV : Watch Gibson's original TV series about guitars, music, and culture. Watch, learn, and get inspired.

TRAINING CALENDAR:  Try to play a little each day. Short regular sessions are better than one long session. Use the training calendar to set a structure and get gentle reminders.

TUNE : The built-in tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. If you’re a beginner, there’s a “how to tune” video that will guide you.

METRONOME:  Nail the rhythm with this metronome that includes all the standard features. The Gibson App - The only guitar app you need.

---------

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING AND TERMS : We offer two auto-renewing subscription options : $14.99 per month  $89.99 per year.  These prices are for the US. Pricing in other countries may vary. For the yearly subscription, we offer a free trial. You can cancel anytime during the free trial and not be charged. The annual subscription will automatically start unless you cancel at least 24-hours before the end of your trial period. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, and your credit card will be charged through your iTunes account.  You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings, but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. Any unused portion of your free trial period will be lost when you purchase a subscription.

CONTACT AND SUPPORT:  Run into trouble? Or have feedback, questions or suggestions? Contact us at app.support@gibson.com or check out the FAQ in the app.

Privacy policy ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html Terms of use ampedguitar.com/terms.html

Enjoy, and good luck!

/The Gibson App team

title: Gibson: Guitar lessons & songs

creator: Zoundio AB
descriptionHtml:
Easiest way to learn Guitar! 100% beginner-friendly guitar lessons to play electric & acoustic music! The Gibson app, your guitar teacher, offers immersive & interactive guitar lessons with real-time feedback. Learn guitar chords, read guitar tabs, utilize a guitar tuner, and play songs with step-by-step guidance from some of the world’s best guitarists. Create your own guitar band and become a guitar hero after learning!

The Gibson App is a guitar teacher, providing all the tools and lessons you need for your guitar learning journey (electric guitar, acoustic guitar, etc.). It offers a fun and educational experience to keep you motivated on your guitar learning journey!

IMMERSIVE & MOTIVATING GUITAR LEARNING: Learn how to play Guitar! Our interactive guitar lessons turn each learning step into an immersive & motivating experience. The app listens to you play and provides real-time feedback. Learn guitar tricks like a true guitar hero without ever feeling like a beginner. You’ll get optimal guitar learning app conditions. How to play guitar? - never too hard, never too easy - just right for you with Gibson app.

FROM BEGINNER TO GUITAR PRO: Learn how to play guitar and track the progress! Follow a step-by-step guitar learning saga developed by expert guitar teachers. Learn to read guitar tabs and practice guitar chords at your own pace. From beginner to guitar hero, start your own guitar band!

STEP-BY-STEP GUIDANCE:  Learn new guitar tricks and songs in bite-sized parts, and get video guidance for each part before you play the interactive guitar game play.

100s OF FAMOUS SONGS:  Our guitar song catalogue includes songs by Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Lynyrd Skynyrd, and many more. Find your favorite guitar band. We regularly add new guitar songs.

LEARN FROM SOME OF THE WORLD’S BEST GUITARISTS: Video guitar learning guidance from world-class guitarists and guitar teachers, combined with interactive gameplay for acoustic & electric guitar will keep your engagement on top!

GIBSON TV : Watch Gibson's original TV series about guitars, music, and culture. Watch, learn guitar, and get inspired.

TRAINING CALENDAR: Try to play a little each day. Short, regular sessions are better than long guitar lessons. Use the training calendar, set a structure, get gentle reminders, and don't miss the guitar chord lessons.

TUNE : The built-in guitar tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. Watch our 'How to tune' video for guidance with our guitar tuner.

METRONOME:  Nail the rhythm with this metronome that includes all standard features. The Gibson App - The only guitar teacher you need.

---

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS : We offer two US auto-renewing options: $19.99/month or $119.99/year. Prices may vary in other countries. A free trial for an annual subscription includes free cancellation. The annual subscription starts automatically unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the trial period ends. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, with charges applied to your credit card via your account. You can turn off auto-renewal in settings, without refunds for unused periods. Unused free trial time will be forfeited upon subscription purchase.

CONTACT & SUPPORT: Run into trouble or have feedback, questions, or suggestions? Contact us at app.support@gibson.com or check the in-app FAQ.

Privacy policy: ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of use: ampedguitar.com/terms.html

How to play guitar? - Follow guitar lessons, learn guitar, and practice guitar tricks. Use the guitar tuner and learn to play using guitar tabs. And we may soon hear new guitar band music!
No matter which guitar you choose - electric guitar or acoustic one - just enjoy the guitar songs and music you play.
Enjoy Gibson guitar learning app! Become a guitar hero!

/The Gibson App team

Gibson: Guitar lessons & songs
2.5.19

creator: Zoundio AB
descriptionHtml:
Easiest way to learn Guitar! 100% beginner-friendly guitar lessons to play electric & acoustic music! The Gibson app, your guitar teacher, offers immersive & interactive guitar lessons with real-time feedback. Learn guitar chords, read guitar tabs, utilize a guitar tuner, and play songs with step-by-step guidance from some of the world’s best guitarists. Create your own guitar band and become a guitar hero after learning!

The Gibson App is a guitar teacher, providing all the tools and lessons you need for your guitar learning journey (electric guitar, acoustic guitar, etc.). It offers a fun and educational experience to keep you motivated on your guitar learning journey!

IMMERSIVE & MOTIVATING GUITAR LEARNING: Learn how to play Guitar! Our interactive guitar lessons turn each learning step into an immersive & motivating experience. The app listens to you play and provides real-time feedback. Learn guitar tricks like a true guitar hero without ever feeling like a beginner. You’ll get optimal guitar learning app conditions. How to play guitar? - never too hard, never too easy - just right for you with Gibson app.

FROM BEGINNER TO GUITAR PRO: Learn how to play guitar and track the progress! Follow a step-by-step guitar learning saga developed by expert guitar teachers. Learn to read guitar tabs and practice guitar chords at your own pace. From beginner to guitar hero, start your own guitar band!

STEP-BY-STEP GUIDANCE:  Learn new guitar tricks and songs in bite-sized parts, and get video guidance for each part before you play the interactive guitar game play.

100s OF FAMOUS SONGS:  Our guitar song catalogue includes songs by Eric Clapton, B.B. King, Santana, Aerosmith, Tom Petty, Dolly Parton, The Beatles, Lynyrd Skynyrd, and many more. Find your favorite guitar band. We regularly add new guitar songs.

LEARN FROM SOME OF THE WORLD’S BEST GUITARISTS: Video guitar learning guidance from world-class guitarists and guitar teachers, combined with interactive gameplay for acoustic & electric guitar will keep your engagement on top!

GIBSON TV : Watch Gibson's original TV series about guitars, music, and culture. Watch, learn guitar, and get inspired.

TRAINING CALENDAR: Try to play a little each day. Short, regular sessions are better than long guitar lessons. Use the training calendar, set a structure, get gentle reminders, and don't miss the guitar chord lessons.

TUNE : The built-in guitar tuner supports standard tuning and loads of alternative tuning options, including chromatic tuning. Choose between automatic string detection or manual. Watch our 'How to tune' video for guidance with our guitar tuner.

METRONOME:  Nail the rhythm with this metronome that includes all standard features. The Gibson App - The only guitar teacher you need.

---

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS : We offer two US auto-renewing options: $19.99/month or $119.99/year. Prices may vary in other countries. A free trial for an annual subscription includes free cancellation. The annual subscription starts automatically unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the trial period ends. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term, with charges applied to your credit card via your account. You can turn off auto-renewal in settings, without refunds for unused periods. Unused free trial time will be forfeited upon subscription purchase.

CONTACT & SUPPORT: Run into trouble or have feedback, questions, or suggestions? Contact us at app.support@gibson.com or check the in-app FAQ.

Privacy policy: ampedguitar.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of use: ampedguitar.com/terms.html

How to play guitar? - Follow guitar lessons, learn guitar, and practice guitar tricks. Use the guitar tuner and learn to play using guitar tabs. And we may soon hear new guitar band music!
No matter which guitar you choose - electric guitar or acoustic one - just enjoy the guitar songs and music you play.
Enjoy Gibson guitar learning app! Become a guitar hero!

/The Gibson App team
descriptionShort: Learn guitar: Use a guitar tuner, practice guitar chords, and guitar tricks.
